body: Ha jokes on you, I didn't download this shit, I streamed it!
haha.....that english on last page, what a dick

Shmad Disagree. Thanks to the manga creator who put 2 pages of scat in there(not 1), these people tagged it as scat. You seem to believe whoever made this tag "accidentally"(due to a lack of major fetish) should be replaced, but really you could've think twice before saying something better. Anyways, if you see a page of scat, would I tagged it as scat ? Yeah. Why? Because it's scat in there.

@It feel good It's the exact thing it says, low amount of scat. Aka not a major fetish in the work but only present in like 1 panel. Don't tell me why that's a thing, the ones who make the tags at sadpanda are braindead. Adding completely irrelevant tags like this, but actually good ones that are needed are just ignored.
I hate this kind of censoring...
